files_description: Browse the files saved to the device here.
website_description: Your hosted website can be found here.
makerspace_description: Content downloaed from the MakerSpace can be found here.
library_description: Browse the downloaded library content here.
files_settings_description: Allow users to browse files you have added to the device. Only users logged in can delete them.
website_settings_description: Upload your website files through the file manager to allow others to use your site offline.
makerspace_settings_description: Downloaded content from your Maker Space account can be access here.
library_settings_description: Content you have downloaded from the Learner's Block Library is availabe here.
portainer_settings_description: Enable or disable Portainer to manage containers on this device.
click_toggle: Click an item below to open the administration. Use the toggles on the right to show or hide the features on the front page.
visit_hostname: Visit the Learner's Block in your browser to start using your device.
404: Nothing here. You may have typed in a wrong address
api_down: The API is unavailable. Try again, or consider restarting the device.
invalid_hostname: You have submitted an invalid hostname. Please try again.
password_reset_success: Your password has been reset successfully
hostname_changed_notification: Your hostname has been updated. Please restart the device for this to take affect.
invalid_input: Invalid Input. Hostnames must be: Max 32 characters; lower case; no spaces; no special characters other than ‘_’ and ‘-‘
change_hostname_warning: Are you sure you want to change the hostname?
disconnect_wifi: Are you sure you want to disconnect from the Wi-Fi?
